reasoning: This is an investigative question asking about the current state of UI changes in the codebase, not an implementation request. Requires exploration of git history and file structure but no code modifications.

scope.notes: No files will be modified. This is a read-only exploration of the existing UI codebase.

integrations.notes: No external integrations required - purely internal codebase exploration.

infrastructure.notes: No infrastructure changes required for an investigation task.

knowledge.notes: Project uses Next.js with Tailwind CSS and Radix UI components - standard patterns to explore.

risk.notes: Read-only exploration poses no risk to the codebase.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Investigation/exploration task with no code modifications. No validation needed as this is a read-only discovery task.

additional_notes.task_nature: This is a question/inquiry about the codebase, not an implementation request. The workflow should focus on exploration and reporting findings rather than planning implementation.
additional_notes.recommended_approach: Explore git diff/status for uncommitted changes, review recent commits for UI modifications, and identify UI component architecture in src/ directory.
